_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

DebitNote.description: A document used to specify debts incurred by the Debtor.

DebitNote.title: Debit Note. Details
DebitNote.description: A document used to specify debts incurred by the Debtor.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Debit Note. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Debit Note. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Debit Note. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Debit Note. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Debit Note. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Debit Note. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Debit Note. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Debit Note. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Debit Note. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Debit Note. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

TaxPointDate.title: Debit Note. Tax Point Date. Date
TaxPointDate.description: The date of the Debit Note, used to indicate the point at which tax becomes applicable.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Debit Note. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

TaxCurrencyCode.title: Debit Note. Tax_ Currency Code. Code
TaxCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for tax amounts in the Debit Note.

PricingCurrencyCode.title: Debit Note. Pricing_ Currency Code. Code
PricingCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for prices in the Debit Note.

PaymentCurrencyCode.title: Debit Note. Payment_ Currency Code. Code
PaymentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for payment in the Debit Note.

PaymentAlternativeCurrencyCode.title: Debit Note. Payment Alternative_ Currency Code. Code
PaymentAlternativeCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the alternative currency used for payment in the Debit Note.

AccountingCostCode.title: Debit Note. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: The Buyer's accounting code, applied to the Credit Note as a whole.

AccountingCost.title: Debit Note. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: The Buyer's accounting code, applied to the Credit Note as a whole, expressed as text.

LineCountNumeric.title: Debit Note. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Debit Note Lines in this document.

InvoicePeriod.title: Debit Note. Invoice_ Period. Period
InvoicePeriod.description: A period (rather than a specific invoice) associated with this document.

DiscrepancyResponse.title: Debit Note. Discrepancy_ Response. Response
DiscrepancyResponse.description: A reason for the Debit Note as a whole.

OrderReference.title: Debit Note. Order Reference
OrderReference.description: A reference to an Order with which this Debit Note is associated.

BillingReference.title: Debit Note. Billing Reference
BillingReference.description: A reference to a billing document associated with this document.

DespatchDocumentReference.title: Debit Note. Despatch_ Document Reference. Document Reference
DespatchDocumentReference.description: A reference to a Despatch Advice associated with this document.

ReceiptDocumentReference.title: Debit Note. Receipt_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ReceiptDocumentReference.description: A reference to a Receipt Advice associated with this document.

StatementDocumentReference.title: Debit Note. Statement_ Document Reference. Document Reference
StatementDocumentReference.description: A reference to a Statement associated with this document.

ContractDocumentReference.title: Debit Note. Contract_ Document Reference. Document Reference
ContractDocumentReference.description: A reference to a contract associated with this document.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Debit Note. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Debit Note. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Debit Note. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Debit Note. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Debit Note. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

SellerSupplierParty.title: Debit Note. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

TaxRepresentativeParty.title: Debit Note. Tax Representative_ Party. Party

AllowanceCharge.title: Debit Note. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.

Delivery.title: Debit Note. Delivery
Delivery.description: A delivery associated with this document.

DeliveryTerms.title: Debit Note. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: A set of delivery terms associated with this document.

PaymentTerms.title: Debit Note. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A set of payment terms associated with this document.

TaxExchangeRate.title: Debit Note. Tax_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
TaxExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the tax currency.

PricingExchangeRate.title: Debit Note. Pricing_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PricingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the pricing currency.

PaymentExchangeRate.title: Debit Note. Payment_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment currency.

PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate.title: Debit Note. Payment Alternative_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment alternative currency.

TaxTotal.title: Debit Note. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax.

WithholdingTaxTotal.title: Debit Note. Withholding_ Tax Total. Tax Total

RequestedMonetaryTotal.title: Debit Note. Requested_ Monetary Total. Monetary Total
RequestedMonetaryTotal.description: The total amount payable on the Debit Note, including allowances, charges, and taxes.
